thread.title: Givenchy's New Visor Sunglasses Will Be the Next Trending Accessory for 2017 Spring/Summer
thread.title_full: Givenchy's New Visor Sunglasses Will Be the Next Trending Accessory for 2017 Spring/Summer

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Givenchy's New Visor Sunglasses Will Be the Next Trending Accessory for 2017 Spring/Summer
text:
For its Spring/Summer 2017 eyewear collection, Givenchy is introducing a new range of colors of its"VISOR" sunglasses. Balancing the functionality of sports gear with a touch of couture, the hand constructed wraparound mask is made of rubber and metal and comes with a statement neoprene band emblazoned with the words "REAL EYES. REALIZE. REAL LIES." The three new color schemes are: brown shaded front, khaki temples and palladium silver lenses with red band; silver grey front, black temples and palladium silver metal lenses with white band; gun metal and dark brown front, Havana temples and palladium silver metal lenses with black band. Givenchy Men's Spring/Summer 2017 visor sunglasses are available at Givenchy boutiques and select retailers starting January.
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
